completion.item: <[!CDATA[Returns the items imageReturns: the items image ]]>
<[!CDATA[Returns the items textReturns: the text for this item ]]>
<[!CDATA[Tells wether there is new data available since last question.Returns: true if data changed, false if not ]]>
<[!CDATA[Tells wether the item is created or notReturns: true if the item is created or false if not ]]>
<[!CDATA[Reset the change notification buffer to recognize new changes. ]]>

boolean active - true for active and false for inactive

<[!CDATA[Sets the image for the itemParameters: Image image - the new imageThrows: TypeError - when image is not instance of Image ]]>
